title: JSON Agents Message Envelope
description: Canonical JSON structure for messages exchanged between agents.

id.description: Unique identifier for this message instance (UUID or URI recommended).

from.description: Agent or node ID that originated this message.

to.description: Intended recipient(s) of this message (one or more node IDs).

reply_to.description: Optional message ID to which this is a response.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the message was created.

intent.description: Optional high-level intent label extracted from message content.

payload.description: The message body or structured content exchanged between agents.

metadata.description: Optional metadata such as routing hints or MIME information.

trace_id.description: Optional correlation ID for distributed tracing.

security.description: Optional cryptographic or identity context attached to message.

key_id.description: Identifier for the key used to sign this message.

extensions.description: Namespaced extension data following the JSON Agents extension rules.
